params._gbpUsdFeed: Address of Chainlink GBP/USD price feed
params._maxPriceAge: Maximum acceptable age of price data in seconds
params._owner: Initial owner address (should be governance multisig)

returns.gbpValue: The equivalent value in GBP terms

returns._0: decimals The number of decimals (should be 8 for Chainlink)

getGBPUSDPrice().details: Tries primary feed first, falls back to backup if primary fails

returns.updatedAt: The timestamp when price was last updated

getGBPUSDPriceWithValidation().details: Use this in critical operations for extra safety

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBackupFeed(address).details: REDUNDANCY: Backup oracle in case primary fails SECURITY: Validates decimals match and feed is responsive

setPriceBounds(uint256,uint256).details: Should be updated carefully during extreme market conditions

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_getPriceFromFeed(address).notice: Internal function to get price from a specific feed

convertGBPtoUSD(uint256).notice: Convert GBP value to USD amount using current price

convertUSDtoGBP(uint256).notice: Convert USD amount to GBP value using current price

decimals().notice: Get the decimals of the price feed

getGBPUSDPrice().notice: Get the latest GBP/USD price from Chainlink (with backup)

getGBPUSDPriceWithTimestamp().notice: Get the latest GBP/USD price with timestamp

getGBPUSDPriceWithValidation().notice: Get validated GBP/USD price with comprehensive checks

maxPrice().notice: Maximum acceptable GBP/USD price (8 decimals) - default 1.40

maxPriceAge().notice: Maximum age of price data before considered stale (default: 1 hour)

minPrice().notice: Minimum acceptable GBP/USD price (8 decimals) - default 1.15

setPriceBounds(uint256,uint256).notice: Update price bounds for sanity checks

setUseBackup(bool).notice: Enable or disable backup feed usage
